00284         }

00489 function showAll() {
00490   var start = Date.parse($('datestart').value);
00491   var end = Date.parse($('dateend').value);
00492   
00493   window.location.href = "<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']; ?>?view=all&changeview=1&semester=<?php echo $_GET['semester']; ?>&class=<?php echo $_GET['class']; ?>&startdate="+Math.floor(start.getTime()/1000)+"&enddate="+Math.floor(end.getTime()/1000);
00494 }
00495 
00496 function moveTermin(firstGoal,color,lesson,curriculum_id) {
00497   var terminid = firstGoal.toString("d_M_yyyy_H_mm");
00498   if($('date_'+terminid).innerHTML!="&nbsp;") return false;
00499   $('date_'+terminid).style.backgroundColor = color;
00500   $('date_'+terminid).style.color = "rgb("+getContrast(color.substring(4,color.length-1))+")";
00501   $('date_'+terminid).innerHTML = "<div id=\"plan_"+curriculum_id+"\" style=\"float:right;cursor:pointer;margin:0;padding:0;color:red;\" onclick=\"deleteLessonById('"+terminid+"');\">x</div>"+lesson;
00502   new Draggable( $('date_'+terminid), {revert:true });
00503   $('date_'+terminid).className = "dropables loadedSubjects";
00504   return true;
00505 }
00506 
00507 function deleteLesson(firstOldTime,writetoDB) {
00508   if(firstOldTime) { 
00509   // xajax_deleteBooking($('date_'+firstOldTime.toString("d_M_yyyy_H_mm")).firstChild.id.replace('plan_',''),Math.floor(firstOldTime.getTime()/1000));
00510     $('date_'+firstOldTime.toString("d_M_yyyy_H_mm")).style.backgroundColor = "transparent";
00511     $('date_'+firstOldTime.toString("d_M_yyyy_H_mm")).innerHTML = "&nbsp;";
00512     $('date_'+firstOldTime.toString("d_M_yyyy_H_mm")).className = "dropables";
00513   }
00514 }
00515 
00516 function deleteLessonById(id) {
00517   var lessonID = id.split("_");
00518   var lessonDate = Date.parse(lessonID[0]+"."+lessonID[1]+"."+lessonID[2]+" "+lessonID[3]+":"+lessonID[4]);
00519   xajax_deleteBooking($('date_'+lessonDate.toString("d_M_yyyy_H_mm")).firstChild.id.replace('plan_',''),Math.floor(lessonDate.getTime()/1000));
00520   $('rest'+$('date_'+lessonDate.toString("d_M_yyyy_H_mm")).firstChild.id.replace('plan_','')).innerHTML = parseInt($('rest'+$('date_'+lessonDate.toString("d_M_yyyy_H_mm")).firstChild.id.replace('plan_','')).innerHTML)+2;
00521   
00522   $('date_'+lessonDate.toString("d_M_yyyy_H_mm")).style.backgroundColor = "transparent";
00523   $('date_'+lessonDate.toString("d_M_yyyy_H_mm")).innerHTML = "&nbsp;";
00524   $('date_'+lessonDate.toString("d_M_yyyy_H_mm")).className = "dropables";
00525 }
